original_text: There was a man whose name was Elkanah. He lived in a town called Ramah. This town was in the hill country where Ephraim's tribe lived. Elkanah was the son of Jeroham. Jeroham was the son of Elihu. Elihu was the son of Tohu. Tohu was the son of Zuph. Zuph belonged to the tribe of Ephraim. Samuel Introduction Samuel 2
korean_text: 에브라임 산지 라마다임소빔에 에브라임 사람 엘가나라 하는 사람이 있었으니 그는 여로함의 아들이요 엘리후의 손자요 도후의 증손이요 숩의 현손이더라

sentences.original_text: There was a man whose name was Elkanah.
sentences.korean_translation: 한 사람이 있었는데 그의 이름은 엘가나였습니다.

sentences.original_text: He lived in a town called Ramah.
This town was in the hill country
Elkanah was the son of Jeroham.
Jeroham was the son of Elihu.
Elihu was the son of Tohu.
Tohu was the son of Zuph.
Zuph belonged to the tribe of Ephraim.
